About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

I am currently working as an I.T. Specialist for a local school district. I got my Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science in May of 2017. I am working on my Master's degree in Computer Science as well. On the side I create my own sites and have helpes student with developing apps in React Native.

West Las Vegas Public Schools

Technology Specialist

• Provide technical support for users throughout the district. • Maintain, configure, and install servers, network infrastructure, and other network hardware. • Provide efficient and satisfactory customer service. • Provide support by different means such as email, remote tools, telephone etc. • Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve service requests. • Work on SCCM to deploy software as well as deploy images for computers. • Help with phone technology.

I.T.S @ NMHU

Technician

• Provide software and hardware troubleshooting support for faculty, staff, and students. • Assist in the maintenance of PCs, printers, laptops, tablets, and telephony used by faculty, staff and students. • Imaging of PCs on an as needed basis. • Transferring of users documents applications as a result of upgrades. • Diagnosing network connection problems. • Providing limited disk or file recovery assistance to customers. • Assist students/faculty with removal of virus/malware on a walk-in basis. • Helping customers install software packages that are distributed by ITS. • Maintaining the IT Services job ticket database. • Perform office moves and setups. • Assist in installation and maintenance of printers. • Maintain ITS inventory database. • Maintain regular attendance. • Perform other duties as assigned.

ARMAS @ NMHU

Math Tutor/Grader

• Instructed first and second-year students in introductory and intermediate level finance and related courses. • Assisted students in solving problems, clarifying concepts, thus dramatically increasing their grades and performance in the subjects tutored.
